title: Blogger’s notebook: File Explorer tabs, Ignite, and Windows 11 22H2
description:
Has Microsoft started to roll out items in Windows 11 that make us crusty old timers finally upgrade, that make us think, “Hmm, that’s kinda cool,” instead of wanting an older feature back?

It's starting to look that way.

File Explorer tabs

I’m thinking specifically about File Explorer tabs — currently in preview mode — where you can quickly launch a second session of File Explorer with a quick click on “Plus” icon. Until now, we’ve had t
